mapper.update:
update T_CRM_CUSTOMER
INVESTOR_NAME = #{investorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_DATE = #{openDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANCEL_DATE = #{cancelDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_OPERATOR = #{openOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CANCEL_OPERATOR = #{cancelOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_TYPE = #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECT_DATE = #{effectDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BELONG_TYPE = #{belongType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BELONG_TO = #{belongTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where INVESTOR_NO = #{investorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_CRM_CUSTOMER set INVESTOR_NAME = #{investorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_DATE = #{openDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CANCEL_DATE = #{cancelDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_OPERATOR = #{openOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CANCEL_OPERATOR = #{cancelOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_TYPE = #{custType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFFECT_DATE = #{effectDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_DATE = #{expireDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BELONG_TYPE = #{belongType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BELONG_TO = #{belongTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INVESTOR_NO = #{investorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.*,t1.DEPT_NAME from T_CRM_CUSTOMER t left join T_CRM_DEPT t1 on t.DEPT_CODE = t1.DEPT_CODE
